records.location_details: A migrant boat was detected in the Libyan Search and Rescue Region (SRR), 77 miles from Khoms. The NGO vessel Ocean Viking was 30 nautical miles northwest of the migrant boat.
records.where_clear: Libyan Search and Rescue Region, 77 miles from Khoms
records.context_note: Frontex surveillance aircraft detected a migrant boat in the Libyan SRR. NGO speedboats were rescuing 11 migrants when the Libyan Coast Guard performed dangerous manoeuvres and fired several shots at close range in the direction of the speedboats, risking the lives and safety of those on board.
records.evidence_quote: the Libyan Coast Guard (LCG) began a series of dangerous manoeuvres and fired several shots at close range in direction of the speed boats.
